QuestData.Title: Back to Har'koa
QuestData.Description: And now it is time for you to return to the leopard goddess. Somehow I sense that she has other plans for you.$B$BTell her that no matter what, we are eternal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Har'koa at the Altar of Har'koa.
QuestData.RewardText: <The cat goddess howls in pain.>$B$BMy spirit cries out in grief at the loss of another friend. But fear not, he will return and his spirit will live on forever.
